description: Mishimagi You, nicknamed Missy/Misshi (ミッシー) by the girls, is the coach of the Shiratama Soft Tennis team and a former national champion. While he may be rather lazy and a bit of a drunkard (as depicted when he drank a lot with the vice principal), he deeply cares for each of the girls as any teacher would and wish nothing more than to see them succeed.
name: Mishimagi You
